docs.title: Welcome to the RANGER Group webpage
docs.text: The Regulation & Genome Evolution Research group focuses on understanding the dynamic gene expression of proliferative stages and tissues in organisms across the tree of life. The group was established in 2024 at the Ruđer Bošković Institute (RBI) within the Laboratory for Computational Biology and Translational Medicine, Division of Electronics.

docs.title: Job openings
docs.text: We are always interested in highly motivated applicants. For more information, please contact Damir Baranašić at dbaranas@irb.hr.
